attributes.value: Has the highest regard for loyalty
Values decorum, dignity and proper behavior
Finds artwork boring
Finds introspection to be a waste of time
Finds merrymaking and partying worthwhile activities
Considers craftsmanship to be relatively worthless
Respects perseverance
Can easily fall in love or develop positive sentiments
Is generally quite confident of her abilities when undertaking specific ventures
Could not care less about her appearance, talents or other personal vanities
Tends to hang on to grievances
Is easily moved to mercy
Generally finds herself quite hopeful about the future
Tends to consider what others think of her
Is private to the point of paranoia, unwilling to reveal even basic information about herself
Forms strong emotional bonds with others, at times to her detriment
Prefers to be alone
Only rarely tries to assert herself in conversation
Has an utterly languid pace of easy living, calm and slow
Horrible intuition
